name: Spaghetti
description: Spaghetti is a long, thin, solid, cylindrical pasta.
Instructions: Cook the spaghetti, make the sauce, and serve.

name: Pizza
description: Pizza is a savory dish of Italian origin.
Instructions: Make the dough, add the toppings, and bake.

name: Burger
description: A hamburger is a sandwich consisting of one or more cooked patties of ground meat.
Instructions: Cook the patty, assemble the burger, and serve.
